name: Million Marker
headline: 23andMe for environmental exposures
description: We are a service for people to learn about their personal environmental exposures. Our first product is a urine test for exposure to chemicals in everyday products.

COLLECT YOUR SAMPLE
## Reclaim your health from toxic ingredients
Foods, household items, and personal care products can contain harmful chemicals.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/millionmarker.com/pages/learn>)
2
MAIL YOUR TEST
## Test your body for chemicals that disrupt hormones.
Million Marker is the ONLY mail-in test for BPA, BPA alternatives, phtalates, parabens, and oxybenzone.
[SHOP NOW](https://www.millionmarker.com/</collections/all>)

LEARN WHAT'S INSIDE
## Say hello to a healthier you.
Discover your personal toxic chemical exposures and how to reduce them.
[SAMPLE REPORT](https://www.millionmarker.com/</pages/sample-reports>)
[ 1 COLLECT YOUR SAMPLE COLLECT YOUR SAMPLE ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#panel-1>) [ 2 MAIL YOUR TEST MAIL YOUR TEST ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#panel-2>) [ 3 LEARN WHAT'S INSIDE LEARN WHAT'S INSIDE ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#panel-3>)
## Detect & DetoxTest Kit
Simply send us a small urine sample and record your routine in the Exposure Journal on our secure portal website. Our team of specialists will identify your exact toxic exposures to 13 different hormone-disrupting chemicals, analyze your diet and product use, identify the sources of your toxic exposures, and provide personalized recommendations to reduce exposures easily. 
[SHOP NOW](https://www.millionmarker.com/</products/detect-detox-test-kit>)
## Detect & Detox Test Kit: 2-Pack
With this package, you can monitor your lifestyle changes and toxic exposures with 1 initial and 1 follow-up Detect and Detox Test Kit that includes analysis of your diet and product use. Compare your exposure levels over time and use your personalized recommendations to identify and fully eliminate any unseen sources of exposure.
[SHOP NOW](https://www.millionmarker.com/</products/detect-detox-test-kit-lifestyle-counseling>)
## Testimonials
"I have long been waiting for a way for my patients to test and monitor their exposure to chemicals that can harm their fertility. Today, they can! The Million Marker Detect and Detox test kit helps my patients understand and reduce their harmful chemical exposures before and during their fertility journey. Million Marker offers an innovative way to learn how to change your lifestyle and rid yourself of toxic chemical exposures that can affect your health and fertility — and lead to a healthier and brighter tomorrow."
- Aimee Eyvazzadeh, MD, MPH
"Before Million Marker, I would have continued knowing under the surface that something was wrong but not having access to the means to deal with it. Now, I never feel like I’m guessing, and neither does the rest of my family."
- Katayoun A
"You get so many graphs and so much information in the results. I love that it gives you options, suggesting approved products to use instead. I truly understood that even 'clean' products can have potentially harmful chemicals. I'm starting to get rid of products I was using because I just didn't know."
- Jennifer S.
## Meet Our Experts
Our health experts are working hard to help you on your detox journey. Million Marker’s team of doctors, dietitians, and health scientists ensure that you will get the most out of our products.
### Jenna Hua, RD, MPH, PHD
#### Chief Executive Officer, Founder
A registered dietitian and environmental health scientist by training, Jenna's past research has focused on how our surrounding environment impacts our behaviors and health. An ardent believer in disease prevention, she wants to provide personalized preventive strategies to everyone to lead a healthier life.
[LEARN MORE](https://www.millionmarker.com/</pages/jenna-hua>)
### Jo Rochester, MS, PhD
#### Chief Scientific Officer
Jo has spent over a decade studying how substances in the environment affect hormones and health. Jo believes that the threat of toxic chemical exposures is a universal issue and that people should know what they are being exposed to. Her work at Million Marker empowers people to take charge of their own toxic exposures and make informed choices for themselves and their families.
[](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#>)
### Aimee Eyvazzadeh, MD, MPH
#### Medical Advisor
Dr. Aimee is an internationally recognized fertility specialist and is well-known as The Egg Whisperer. She graduated from UCLA School of Medicine and completed her residency in Obstetrics & Gynecology at Harvard Medical School. She also completed a fellowship in Reproductive Endocrinology & Infertility and holds a Masters in Public Health Management and Policy from the University of Michigan. She specializes in innovative personalized fertility care and IVF, and is a fellow of the American College of Obstetrics and Gynecology. 
[](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#>)
### Michael Green, 
#### Strategy Advisor
Michael Green is Founder and former CEO of the Center for Environmental Health ([CEH](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/ceh.org/>)). Today, he advises corporate, philanthropic and non-profit leaders on strategy and social entrepreneurship. He has worked for the US EPA and US DOE, volunteered for Mother Teresa in Kolkata and received the Compassion in Action Award from the Dalai Lama Foundation for his work protecting children from lead. He serves on the Boards of [Kreddha ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/www.kreddha.org/>)International, Camp For All Kids ([CFAK](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/campforallkids.org/>)), and the [AYA](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/www.ayaresearchinstitute.org/>) Research Institute. Michael reports to his direct supervisors, Dylan Green (born 2007) and Juliette Green (2008). 
[](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#>)
### Brenda Eskenazi, MA, PhD
#### Science Advisor
Brenda Eskenazi is a Professor Emeritus of Public Health at the UC Berkeley School of Public Health, and the founding Director of the Center for Environmental Research and Children’s Health (CERCH). She works locally and globally on the effects of environmental exposures on the health of children. She is interested in environmental exposures ranging from chemical exposure, such as pesticides and dioxins, to air pollution to climate change, and studies how these environmental exposures may interact with social adversities to affect the development of children. 
[](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#>)
[ Jenna Chief Executive Officer, Founder Jenna HuaRD, MPH, PHD  ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#expert-jenna>) [ Jo Chief Scientific Officer Jo RochesterMS, PhD  ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#EXPERT-Rochester>) [ Aimee Medical Advisor Aimee EyvazzadehMD, MPH  ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#EXPERT-Eyvazzadeh>) [ Michael Strategy Advisor Michael Green ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#EXPERT-michael-green>) [ Brenda Science Advisor Brenda EskenaziMA, PhD  ](https://www.millionmarker.com/<#EXPERT-Eskenazi>)
## Approved Products
Lower your toxic exposures by shopping for products vetted by Million Marker to have:
**NO BPAs, phthalates, sulfates, parabens, oxybenzone, glycerin from non-vegetable sources, or other unapproved chemicals**
[LEARN MORE](https://www.millionmarker.com/<https:/millionmarker.com/pages/resources>)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Million Marker**

**Mission:** Million Marker aims to be the "23andMe for environmental exposures," providing individuals with insights into their personal chemical exposures from everyday products.

**Overview:** Founded in 2019 and based in Berkeley, California, Million Marker started as a service to help people understand their environmental exposures. Their flagship product is a urine test that analyzes exposure to various harmful chemicals, including parabens, phthalates, and synthetic alternatives to BPA.

**Founders and Team:** The company was part of Y Combinator's S19 batch and is co-founded by Jenna Hua, a registered dietitian and environmental health scientist, along with a small team of just two employees. They leverage expertise from a diverse advisory panel, including medical and scientific experts in environmental health.

**Services:** 
- **Detect & Detox Test Kit:** Customers can order a kit, submit a urine sample, and receive analysis on their exposure to 13 hormone-disrupting chemicals. This service includes dietary analysis and personalized reduction strategies.
- **Education Resources:** Million Marker also offers a wealth of resources on its website, educating users about the adverse effects of various chemicals and providing healthier product alternatives.

**Location:** The company is situated in the San Francisco Bay Area, specifically Berkeley, which is known for its focus on health and environmental issues.

**Focus Areas:** 
- Consumer Health Services
- Digital Health
- Environmental Health Awareness

**Website:** For more information on their products and services, you can visit [Million Marker](https://www.millionmarker.com/).

**Conclusion:** Million Marker is positioned at the intersection of health and technology, empowering individuals to take control of their health by learning about and reducing their exposure to toxic chemicals. This unique offering is part of a growing trend towards personal health monitoring and environmental awareness, reflecting a shift in consumer consciousness about the products they use daily.
